content: अभिषिच् {c6c} <ab>U.</ab> [°सिच्, स् changed to ष् by <ls>P. VIII. 3. 65</ls>] {@--1@} To sprinkle, pour down upon, water, wet, shower upon (<ab>fig.</ab> also); स्नातीहाभ्यषिचज्जलैः <ls>Bk. 6. 21</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">15. 3</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">6. 23</ls>; संगे पुनर्बहुतराममृताभिषिक्तां <ls>Ch. P. 29</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab>; अथ वपुरभिषेक्तुं तास्तदांभोभिरीषुः <ls>Śi. 7. 75.</ls> {@--2@} To anoint, consecrate, appoint &c. (by sprinkling water on the head); to crown, install, inaugurate (with <ab>loc.</ab> of the post of authority); अग्निवर्णमभिषिच्य राघवः स्वे पदे <ls>R. 19. 1</ls>, <ls n="R.">17. 13</ls>; सोऽटवीराज्येऽभिषिक्तः <ls>H. 2</ls>; <ls>V. 5. 23.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To have another consecrated, inaugurated &c. {@--2@} To let oneself be crowned.
